section.name: AndroMDA Spring Cartridge
section.p: A cartridge based on the Spring Framework. This cartridge can work either without an EJB container (i.e. standalone Tomcat for example) or within an EJB container (using EJB itself) simply by modifying a few namespace properties.
Please NOTE that this cartridge MUST be used in conjunction with the Hibernate Cartridge in order to take advantage of Hibernate persistence.
